Keyboard shortcuts for Quip

A visual cheat-sheet for the 52 keyboard shortcuts found in Quip

Original Reference Report Issue

Anywhere

Toggle styles between different types of headings and lists

  • `

Indent a list item

  • Tab

De-indent a list item

  • Shift
  • Tab

Add a single space between lines

  • Shift
  • Enter

Stop editing

  • Esc

  • /
